subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following Rajput kingdoms was known for its bravery and military prowess?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित राजपूत साम्राज्यों में से कौन सा अपनी बहादुरी और सैन्य प्रतिभा के लिए जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: Chauhans were known for their bravery and military prowess in the battle of Tarain.
explanation_hi: चौहान अपने साहस और सैन्य प्रतिभा के लिए तारैन की लड़ाई में जाने जाते थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal is considered the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक माने जाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following Pratihara king was known for his expansion of the empire?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित प्रतिहार राजा को अपनी साम्राज्य का विस्तार के लिए जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: Mihira Bhoja is known for his expansion of the Pratihara empire.
explanation_hi: मिहिर बोहज प्रतिहार साम्राज्य का विस्तार के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous Chauhan king of the 12th century?
question_hi: 12वीं शताब्दी के प्रसिद्ध चौहान राजा कौन थे?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was a famous Chauhan king of the 12th century.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान 12वीं शताब्दी के प्रसिद्ध चौहान राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following dynasties was known for its patronage of art and architecture?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित वंश को कला और वास्तुकला के लिए मान्यता दी जाती थी?
explanation_en: Guhil-Sisodia dynasty was known for its patronage of art and architecture.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश कला और वास्तुकला के लिए जाना जाता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mularaja is considered the founder of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: मुलराज चौहान वंश के संस्थापक माने जाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following Pratihara king was defeated by the Ghaznavids?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित प्रतिहार राजा को घज़नविदों ने हराया था?
explanation_en: Mahipala I was defeated by the Ghaznavids.
explanation_hi: महिपाला I को घज़नविदों ने हराया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous Guhil-Sisodia king of the 15th century?
question_hi: 15वीं शताब्दी के प्रसिद्ध गुहिल-सिसोदिया राजा कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha was a famous Guhil-Sisodia king of the 15th century.
explanation_hi: राणा कुंभा 15वीं शताब्दी के प्रसिद्ध गुहिल-सिसोदिया राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following dynasties was known for its expansion of the kingdom in the east?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित वंश को अपने राज्य के पूर्वी विस्तार के लिए जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: Pratihara dynasty was known for its expansion of the kingdom in the east.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश को पूर्वी विस्तार के लिए जाना जाता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Mewar kingdom?
question_hi: मेवाड़ राज्य के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal is considered the founder of the Mewar kingdom.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल मेवाड़ राज्य के संस्थापक माने जाते हैं।
